title: Higher Education Instructional Design Program for Future Literacy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced high school mathematics foundational knowledge and instructional design experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening future literacy for solving complex societal problems in mathematics.

learning_goals: Participants enhance their ability to perceive complex mathematical problems from multiple perspectives through future scenario analysis.
Participants strengthen their decision-making capabilities in uncertain situations through VR simulation-based learning.
Participants establish actionable plans to propose future directions for mathematics education through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
